title: #1479 This is a Crate Training
itunes:title: #1479 This is a Crate Training
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show harkening back to their childhoods as they review some of the entertainment options that were available to them. After a brief conversation about Covid they turn to the phones and speak with a caller who has thoughts on kids wearing masks outside and another who saw a freeway sign outside Seattle that he thought may horrify Adam. As the show wraps up Adam rants about the different behavior in crowds at football stadiums depending on what state they are located in.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
Subscribe to The Jordan Harbinger Show
GetRoman.com/ADS
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
